required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: RMP-A03 Ocular Suspension in Patients With Pterygium
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2a Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of RMP-A03 Ocular Suspension in Patients With Pterygium

brief_summary.textblock: The goal of this clinical trial is to test the safety and efficacy of an ocular medication on the treatment of pterygium.

detailed_description.textblock: Following informed consent, patients with pterygium who meet all eligibility criteria will be randomized to an 84-day double-blinded study to measure the safety and efficacy of the study drug as compared to placebo.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Patients will be randomized in a 1:1:1 fashion
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
study_design_info.masking_description: Sponsor/CRO clinical operations team will also be masked. Sponsor/CRO biostats team and drug supply manager will be unmasked.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pterygium hyperemia grading at Day 28
primary_outcome.description: Pterygium hyperemia grading will be assessed by the principal investigator based on predefined vascularity scale.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pterygium characteristics at Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Pterygium size will be measured by the principal investigator based on predefined scale

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients randomized to dose 1 study drug
arm_group.description: Approximately 25 patients randomized to dose 1 of RMP-A03

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients randomized to dose 2 of study drug
arm_group.description: Approximately 25 patients randomized to dose 2 of RMP-A03

intervention.description: Patients will randomized to dose 1 of RMP-A03
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients randomized to dose 1 study drug

intervention.description: Patients will be randomized to dose 2 of RMP-A03
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients randomized to dose 2 of study drug

intervention.description: Patients will be randomized to RMP-A03 Placebo

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must be at least 18 years old
- Diagnosis of pterygium with specified characteristics
- BCVA of 20/200 or better
- Willingness to attend all study visits and comply with the study procedures
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of ocular disease
- Double pterygium
- History of ocular surgery
- Presence of ocular trauma
- Use of any ocular medication
- Use of contact lens
- Allergy to any of the components of study drug
- Cannot properly administer study drug
- Clinically significant systemic disease that may place the subject at risk or confound study results
- Participation in an investigational study within 30 days prior to screening
- Female participants who are pregnant, nursing, planning a pregnancy, or not using a medically acceptable form of birth control (WOCBP).
